original_text: Look! The day of the Lord will happen soon! It will be a cruel day. The Lord will punish his enemies with great anger. He will destroy the whole land, as well as all the sinners in it.
korean_text: 보라 여호와의 날 곧 잔혹히 분냄과 맹렬히 노하는 날이 이르러 땅을 황폐하게 하며 그 중에서 죄인들을 멸하리니

sentences.original_text: The day of the Lord will happen soon!
It will be a cruel day.
The Lord will punish his enemies
He will destroy the whole land,
as well as all the sinners in it.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 안에 있는 모든 죄인들도 함께 파괴할 것이다.
